description: Ms. codex. Title from leaf 1(bis)b, line 10. Manuscript erroneously foliated beginning on second leaf. Record follows erroneous foliation. Physical description: 24 lines per page; written in small naskh in black on glazed, laid Arabic paper. Catchwords; rubricated through leaf 15a. A few marginal notes. Occasional staining. Origin: 18th century? Incipit: الحمد لله محق الحق ومظهره ... اما بعد فاني لما وقفت
author: Ibn al-Muṭahhar al-Ḥillī, al-Ḥasan ibn Yūsuf, 1250-1325
abstract: Treatise on Shiʻite law; completed through Kitāb al-iʻtikāf.
extent: 210 leaves : paper ; 256 x 201 (180 x 115) mm bound to 256 x 205 mm
creator: Ibn al-Muṭahhar al-Ḥillī, al-Ḥasan ibn Yūsuf, 1250-1325
ابن المطهر الحلي، الحسن بن يوسف، 1250-1325
subject: Islamic law—Early works to 1800
binding_note: Full brown leather with flap; blind-tooled fillets; red leather doublures.
member_of_collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
